name: WFM Codespace
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install'
postStartCommand: bash -lc '(uvicorn backend.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 &) && (cd frontend && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173 &)'
